page.title: Settings
page.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

subscription.title: Subscription Details
subscription.description: Manage your plan and billing information
subscription.subscriptionEndingDescription: Your subscription will be cancelled on

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Subscription
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will still have access until the end of your current billing period.

cancelled.title: Subscription Cancelled
cancelled.description: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

accentColor.title: Accent Color
accentColor.warningMessage: Your accent color preference is saved, but custom accent colors are not yet applied throughout the app. This feature will be activated soon.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.warningMessage: Your font size preference is saved, but dynamic font sizing is not yet applied throughout the app. This feature will be activated soon.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Choose your preferred currency for all transactions and displays
currency.label: Currency
currency.info: This currency will be used for data entry and displaying all amounts

defaultViews.title: Default View Preferences
defaultViews.description: Set your preferred default views for module pages. You can always override these on individual pages.

contentView.title: Content View
contentView.description: Choose the default view for displaying content cards (income, expenses, etc.)

statsView.title: Statistics View
statsView.description: Choose the default view for displaying statistics cards at the top of module pages

error.title: Error
error.accentColorDescription: Failed to save accent color preference
error.fontSizeDescription: Failed to save font size preference
error.contentViewDescription: Failed to save default content view preference
error.statsViewDescription: Failed to save default statistics view preference

dashboardLayouts.title: Dashboard Layouts
dashboardLayouts.description: Customize your dashboard by creating and managing different layouts
dashboardLayouts.noLayoutsFound: No layouts found. Create your first layout or initialize presets.
dashboardLayouts.customLayoutsInfo: Custom layouts are available for Wealth tier subscribers.

editor.description: Configure which widgets to show and their visibility on your dashboard.

planned-expenses.label: Planned Expenses
planned-expenses.description: Recurring expense payments for selected month

layoutActivated.title: Layout activated
layoutActivated.description: Dashboard layout has been activated successfully.

layoutDeleted.title: Layout deleted
layoutDeleted.description: Dashboard layout has been deleted successfully.

presetsInitialized.title: Presets initialized
presetsInitialized.description: Default layout presets have been created.

layoutCreated.title: Layout created
layoutCreated.description: Dashboard layout has been created successfully.

layoutUpdated.title: Layout updated
layoutUpdated.description: Dashboard layout has been updated successfully.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Layout
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this layout? This action cannot be undone.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Manage which emails you receive from us
email.warningMessage: Your notification preferences are saved, but email notifications are not yet being sent. This feature will be activated soon.

marketing.label: Marketing Emails
marketing.description: Receive emails about new features, tips, and special offers

productUpdates.label: Product Updates
productUpdates.description: Get notified when we release new features or improvements

securityAlerts.label: Security Alerts
securityAlerts.description: Important security notifications about your account

billing.label: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Invoices, payment confirmations, and billing updates

weeklySummary.label: Weekly Summary
weeklySummary.description: A weekly digest of your financial activity and insights

push.title: Push Notifications
push.warningMessage: Your notification preferences are saved, but push notifications are not yet active. This feature will be activated soon.

budgetAlerts.label: Budget Alerts
budgetAlerts.description: Get notified when you are approaching your budget limits

goalMilestones.label: Goal Milestones
goalMilestones.description: Celebrate when you reach savings goals or milestones

incomeNotifications.label: Income Notifications
incomeNotifications.description: Get notified when you receive income or payments

emailUpdated.title: Email Notifications Updated
emailUpdated.description: Your email notification preferences have been saved.

pushUpdated.title: Push Notifications Updated
pushUpdated.description: Your push notification preferences have been saved.

error.title: Error
error.emailDescription: Failed to update email notification preferences
error.pushDescription: Failed to update push notification preferences

analytics.title: Analytics & Tracking
analytics.description: Control what data we collect to improve our service

usageAnalytics.label: Usage Analytics
usageAnalytics.description: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data

errorReporting.label: Error Reporting
errorReporting.description: Automatically send error reports to help us fix bugs

performanceMonitoring.label: Performance Monitoring
performanceMonitoring.description: Help us optimize performance by sharing performance metrics

dataVisibility.title: Data Visibility
dataVisibility.description: Control how your data is used within the platform

private.label: Private
private.description: Your data is completely private and never shared or used in aggregate statistics

anonymous.label: Anonymous
anonymous.description: Your data may be used in anonymous aggregate statistics to improve our service

dataExport.title: Export Your Data
dataExport.description: Download all your data in a portable format (GDPR compliant)
dataExport.warningMessage: Data export functionality is currently in development. Once available, you'll be able to download all your financial data.
dataExport.info: You will be able to request a copy of all your personal data. We'll prepare a downloadable file containing all your information including income sources, expenses, goals, and account details.

analyticsUpdated.title: Analytics Preferences Updated
analyticsUpdated.description: Your privacy preferences have been saved.

dataVisibilityUpdated.title: Data Visibility Updated
dataVisibilityUpdated.description: Your data visibility is now set to

dataExportRequested.title: Data Export Requested
dataExportRequested.description: Your data export will be ready shortly. We'll send you an email with the download link.

authMethod.title: Authentication Method
authMethod.description: Your account authentication is managed by your identity provider
authMethod.securityInfo: Your password and account security are managed by Google. To update your password or security settings, visit your Google Account.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.warningMessage: Two-Factor Authentication is currently in development. Once available, you'll be able to add an extra layer of security to your account.
twoFactor.enableDescription: Require a verification code in addition to your password

enabled.title: Two-Factor Authentication is Enabled
enabled.description: Your account is protected with an additional layer of security.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage devices that are currently logged into your account
sessions.warningMessage: Session tracking is currently in development. The sessions shown below are examples of what you'll see once this feature is live.

twoFactorEnabled.title: 2FA Enabled
twoFactorEnabled.description: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.

sessionRevoked.title: Session Revoked
sessionRevoked.description: The session has been terminated successfully.

sessionsRevoked.title: Sessions Revoked
sessionsRevoked.description: All other sessions have been terminated.
